content:
For those balloting IGs in the upcoming release, a few deadlines to be aware of:
- Feb 17: Your IG Proposals must have been submitted to and approved by the FMG. As well, your IG must be publishing successfully on the CI build and be substantively complete
- Mar 24: Final content deadline. No changes after this date without Grahame's permission. IG checklist must be complete, QA must be clean
- The QA deadline will be either Mar. 10 or Mar. 17 - FMG will be asking @Melva Peters to check with the projects who are balloting and seeing which they'd prefer. No substantive changes will be allowed after this date
